'''''The General in His Labyrinth''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. The achievement is earned during {{Quest|To Whence the Smoke Drifts}}.

==Trivia==
* The achievement's name is a reference to ''{{w|The General in His Labyrinth}}'', a novel by {{w|Gabriel García Márquez}}.
** The only exception is in the Spanish localization, which instead references {{w|Walt Whitman}}'s poem "{{w|O Captain! My Captain!}}"
